title: Exquisite Polki & Ruby Chandbali Jhumka - Chandanaalu
materials: 22K Gold (Swarna) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features uncut Polki diamonds (Polki Vairam) and a vibrant Ruby (Ratna) gemstone. High-quality craftsmanship ensures lasting shine and durability.
features: These Chandbali Jhumkas feature a circular polki setting at the top, transitioning to a striking ruby teardrop pendant with petal-shaped polki accents. The intricate open setting allows light to enhance the sparkle of the polki diamonds. Classic South Indian craftsmanship with modern sensibility.
colors: Rich gold with the mesmerizing sparkle of white polki diamonds and the deep
vibrant red of the ruby. A regal and auspicious color combination.
occasions: or any special event where you want to make a statement. Equally stunning for modern cocktail parties and cultural events.
description: A timeless fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The use of uncut polki diamonds adds a touch of regal elegance, while the vibrant ruby makes it auspicious and eye-catching. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, ensuring exceptional quality and lasting value. A true heirloom piece.
